attributes.action: Allow Glenmoor And Winton Academies to do work experience in year 10.
attributes.background: Year 10 students should be allowed to do year 10 work experience because it prepares students for the real world. Being able to have that knowledge before enforces that idea that they need to work hard to get to where they want.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of your school.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to introduce mandatory work experience for secondary school students, if that's something you would like to see happen.
